welcomeMessage: Hi **@chauler**, how can I help you?

response.value:
Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: In the "Contact Us" form. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships. Detection Algorithm: Checking if all form inputs have associated labels. Explanation of Error: The password input field does not have an associated label, which can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand its purpose. --- Snippet with error: ```html
``` Location of error: In the "Contact Us" form. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships. Detection Algorithm: Checking if all form inputs have associated labels. Explanation of Error: The first radio button does not have an associated label, which can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand its purpose. --- Snippet with error: ```html
``` Location of error: In the footer. WCAG Guideline violated: 2.1.1 Keyboard. Detection Algorithm: Checking if there are any mouse-specific event handlers. Explanation of Error: The onmouseout event handler is mouse-specific, which can make the website less accessible for keyboard-only users. Consider using focus and blur event handlers instead. --- Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: In the "Featured Games" section. WCAG Guideline violated: 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value. Detection Algorithm: Checking if all iframes have a title attribute. Explanation of Error: The iframe does not have a title attribute, which can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand its content.

followups.message: What are some best practices for improving accessibility in HTML forms?

b.description: Ask Copilot or type / for commands

metadata.helpTextPrefix: You can ask me general programming questions, or chat with the following participants which have specialized expertise and can perform actions:
metadata.helpTextVariablesPrefix: You can also help me understand your question by using the following variables to give me extra context:

helpTextPostfix.value:
To have a great conversation, ask me questions as if I was a real programmer:

* **Show me the code** you want to talk about by having the files open and selecting the most important lines.
* **Make refinements** by asking me follow-up questions, adding clarifications, providing errors, etc.
* **Review my suggested code** and tell me about issues or improvements, so I can iterate on it.

You can also ask me questions about your editor selection by [starting an inline chat session](command:inlineChat.start).

Learn more about [GitHub Copilot](https://docs.github.com/copilot/using-github-copilot/getting-started-with-github-copilot?tool=vscode&utm_source=editor&utm_medium=chat-panel&utm_campaign=2024q3-em-MSFT-getstarted) in [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/overview).

b.name: GitHub Copilot

Explanation of Error: The first radio button does not have an associated label, which can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand its purpose. --- Snippet with error: ```html
``` Location of error: In the footer. WCAG Guideline violated: 2.1.1 Keyboard. Detection Algorithm: Checking if there are any mouse-specific event handlers. Consider using focus and blur event handlers instead. --- Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: In the "Featured Games" section. WCAG Guideline violated: 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value. Detection Algorithm: Checking if all iframes have a title attribute. Explanation of Error: The iframe does not have a title attribute, which can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand its content. --- Snippet with error: ```html

Welcome to the Gaming World!

Discover the latest and greatest games.

Explore Games
``` Location of error: In the "Hero Section". WCAG Guideline violated: 1.4.3 Contrast (Minimum). Detection Algorithm: Checking if the contrast ratio between text and its background meets the minimum requirement. Explanation of Error: The contrast ratio between the text and its background in the hero section may not meet the minimum requirement, making it difficult for users with moderate visual impairments to read. --- Snippet with error: ```html
Home Games About Contact
``` Location of error: In the navigation bar. WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks. Detection Algorithm: Checking if there are mechanisms to bypass blocks of content that are repeated on multiple web pages. Explanation of Error: The navigation bar does not have a mechanism to bypass it, which can make it difficult for keyboard-only users to navigate the website. Consider adding a "Skip to main content" link at the start of each page.

followups.message: What are some guidelines for improving the contrast ratio in web design?
